name: This is the Only 3D Level
description:
Can you beat Level 1, the only level in the game?

This is the Only 3D Level is a 3D puzzle game inspired by a flash game with the same concept.

Deep in a Greek forest lies a ruin that was forgotten by time. While traversing the forest with Three, Sven got lost in the forest ruins. Can you help Sven in escaping the forest ruins? There's only one level.

Features

  • 1 level only!
  • 60 stages per level!
  • Supports a PS2 controller! (Keyboard is still required)
  • A less painful version of Quiz of Five!

Sven is six and he's the only playable character. Do you have what it takes to beat Level 1?
